import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Cart } from '../../model/Cart' import FormOder from './formorder/FormOrder' import ListProductOrder from './listProductItem/ListProductOrder' import './Order.css' import OrderBottom from './orderBottom/OrderBottom' export default function Order() { let listCart: Cart[] = [] let localTam = localStorage.getItem('Cart') if (localTam !== null) { listCart = JSON.parse(localTam) } const [listCartItem, setListCartItem] = useState(listCart) let total: number = 0 for (let i = 0; i < listCartItem.length; i++) { total += listCartItem[i].price * listCartItem[i].quantity } return (
